commit message: Added tag 1.51 (2) for changeset 0ebbd9715217
add Hyphenator.js JavaScript library (https://code.google.com/p/hyphenator/) to assets to be used for word hyphenation
change replacement pattern in getFileNameForKey to improve performance

- add option to preferences to disable zoom controls in web view;
- implement word hyphenation in article view with the aid of Hyphenator.js.
add String Template (http://www.stringtemplate.org/) to the library
add date-time format to be used in article view
add date-time format constants to be used in article view
fix file encoding (replace umlauts)
add custom date with time format
improve article html template and styles

- improve article html template preparation with the aid of StringTemplate library (http://www.stringtemplate.org/)
- add custom date with time format support functions.
remove obsolete article url injection
skip DB records, which could not be processed (IllegalStateException)
introduce function to allow different formats for activity title and category/feed title to present amount of unread articles
use different formats for activity title and category/feed title to present amount of unread articles
hide 'Refresh' menu item if work offline
show unread articles amount in activity title
add CSS background setting for WebView (theme dependent)
set update time to 30 min
navigation buttons mode in article view can now be selected in preferences.

Merged changes from Igor Lyubimov:
- Formatted code and xml
- Changed default values for preferences (en-gb hyphenation, default off)
- Added 'thanks'
- Changelog and version bump
Small change to stop 'all articles' refreshing so much (thanks to Richard Quirk)

- Formatted the code
- Own ActionBar style
- Disabled unread-count formatting
- Parse and store labels, display with foreground and background color
- Disabled title and date/time in HTML template
- Fixed title for starred articles
Small fixes
Merged changes from Igor Lyubimov (https://code.google.com/r/igorlyubimov-ttrss-reader/) up to Revision 5fce288273cf from 2013-08-02.

- Added Buttons to HTML-Template (not working yet)
- Minor modifications of last merge
- Removed 'go back after mark read' on main activity
Applied formatting template to all source files again.
HTML-Buttons finally work, star, publish, menu implemented. Needs images for current status (starred, not starred) and better layout.

- When displaying articles use smaller ActionBar only for buttons
- Display title/time/date and attachments/labels within HTML-Template
- Implemented Scroll-Listener for Webview which triggers a method when scrolling reached top or bottom, bottom doesn't work yet. Currently unused.
- Changed some texts and icons and the HTML-Template
Include Feed-Title in HTML-Template
Change title so it matches the title used in the market.

- Moved functionality form different Fragments into new parent class MainListFragment
- Implemented a main ScrollListener for Article-View and the Lists to allow hiding of ActionBar, scroll down hides, scroll up shows it again.
- Reduced title-size
- Removed unused code and commentary

- Reduced timeout for showing the actionBar
- Fixed bug in DBHelper when retrieving unread counts
- Implemented getSinceId in DBHelper for Feeds/Categories but removed it from Data since it doesn't really do what it should do.
Different approach: Only store sinceId when doing a full update (like in cacheArticles()), use the id as before...
Fixed update of unread-count
Ignore tiny movements
ArticleView: Initially hide ActionBar
Fixed 'no feeds displayed in uncategorized feeds'
Added 'markRead/unread' button to actionbar in articleview, added functionality to switch icon depending on status, quickly change status internally to represent changes in UI.

- Fixed bug which lead to unnecessary refreshing of starred/published articles
- Fixed bug which prevented starred/published articles from beeing displayed or refreshed at all
- Better method to ensure articles are displayed when first try returns empty cursor
- Better method to mark everything read in DB
- Removed updateCounters since counters are implicitly updated with feeds and categories
- Initially hide ActionBar and reset state on each article change

Completely redesigned HTML-Template based on the template from owncloud (https://github.com/owncloud/News-Android-App):
- CSS-Styles
- dark/light Theme
- Different layout
- Changed colors
Fix flicker when swiping to next article
Fix display of empty feeds or categories
Removed unused preferences

== Version 1.52 ==
* Improvements by Igor Lyubimov (Hyphenation, HTML-Template, performance, date/time formatting, button navigation)
* Hide ActionBar while scrolling down
* Better dark/light themes for articles
* Performance: faster refresh on startup
* Counters managed locally (reduces server communication)
* ActionBar buttons: read/unread, star, publish, share
